data.title: Spanish Civil War (10)
data.text:
[38] MANUEL BORRÀS FERRÉ, AGAPIT MODEST PAMPLONA FALGUERA,

AND 145 COMPANIONS FROM THE CLERGY AND RELIGIOUS

OF THE ARCHDIOCESE OF TARRAGONA
